~~ (It's not really a point of view of a character.)




It came in contact with the other bot. It's only mission was either drag a 
bot into the selected section, rid of it, or kill it. It might as well find 
it's strength. The Vok had never sensed this one's energy before, but she 
may be worth it.

The long golden segmented arm wrapped itself around Stingtra's waist and 
lifted her straight out of the water. It pulsed light electricity to scan 
her strength.
